title: Low Carb Wraps
directions: In one bowl mix eggs, coconut milk and butter.
In another bowl mix dry ingredients: almond flour, coconut flour, erythritol and salt.
Pour the dry ingredients into the wet mixture and mix well. Let the batter sit for a few minutes so the liquid soaks into the coconut flour.
Grease a skillet (frying pan). In a cool pan pour in the batter to make a thin circle.
Place pan on medium low heat and cook the batter until you see the edges brown and the top surface loses it sheen. (In the video I had the pan very hot and found my wrap was cooking to fast)
If the lifter cannot get under the wrap let it cook a little longer.
Add more grease to pan to make another wrap.
